Last Saturday we were going to have our Spring Gala where we would have celebrated our School Champion, Toby Dowling, former Board of Trustees President and our Community Champion, West Side Realtor Sawyer Smith.

Like so many other things, those plans had to change.

The fact that Toby and Sawyer have given so much back to LCCS is such an honor. It was nice to spend a few socially-distant minutes yesterday catching up to give them a token of our appreciation.

Their plaques are written with words of thanks in some of the 40 languages that are spoken in our students’ homes.

Thank you, Toby and Sawyer! We appreciate you!
We hope that you might join us as we celebrate them by donating to LCCS through #HudsonGives.
We’ll keep showing up for our students no matter what and we can do even more with your help!

Sincerely,
Colin Hogan, Head of School.
